title: Honestly I'm starting to think some of the Jungle items might be overrated
body:
On Yi there's a really high rated player who rushes IE, and I've been getting BF Sword first back and the powerspike is stupidly good.

I just played a Nunu game where I got an 11 minute Rod of Ages and uh. 11 minute RoA is really funny on him. 

I mean Runic Echoes is a pretty good spike for quite a few, and Bloodrazor is good for some but overrated on others. But I mean you see champs like Shaco often forsaking Warrior altogether and Cinderhulk is sometimes better to be delayed. Hell I was Jungling Karthus recently and I went Tear->other shit and skipped Echoes entirely. 

I dunno, I just think it's interesting that quite a few Champs can get away with/actually can prefer not rushing a Jungle item but maybe that's just me. Shit like Shyv and Diana and such I'd still go their items respectively I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Mounting Dread,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=3N3UuhwQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-25T00:10:00.886+0000)
>
> Oh yeah  I forgot Fiddles somehow.
